OOC: I know I haven't posted in a while, due to a lack of ideas for the RPG=
, but I couldn't sit back anymore, I have to comment on this because it's j=
ust the way I am. Warrior Azure, I do not think you're a bad guy. In fact, =
this isn't even your fault, it's rAuq's fault. I am not saying Warrior Azur=
e does not deserve to be a moderator, but he wasn't voted in by the RPG. Le=
t's face it, rAuq, you stepped in suddenly, and without even asking the RPG=
 if they thought this stuff was appropriate, you fling a bunch of new shit =
all over everyone. Some stupid new poll rule because of Dewboy, first of al=
l, which wasn't fair. Unitron (Sorry, can't remember the other name, it bei=
ng new and all, and I love Unicron rip offs!) is absolutely correct about t=
his when he said that we're all being punished for something dipshit (Dewbo=
y) did. Second, Hugar is thrown off the council by someone who was voted in=
 for EQUAL POWER. You threw off someone of EQUAL POWER, rAuq, and without t=
he people voting for it. The people of the RPG are allowed to make this cho=
ice for a reason. Zardus thought it would make the RPG a better community, =
and it has. It is stupid to try to revoke the people's privileges. We might=
 as well have a tyrannical ruler instead of a US President! Then without th=
e people voting him in, we have Warrior Azure as a moderator. I am in no wa=
y saying he won't make a good moderator, but that still is not the point. H=
e wasn't voted into office. He just is suddenly assigned to the position be=
cause "rAuq says so" WHATSUPWITHAT!?!? This seems to be a matter of someone=
's head getting a little too big, maybe. Oh, you can moderate me if you wan=
t, but if you do, I'll leave, and I won't ever come back. What's important =
is that I stood up for what is right. Hugar shouldn't have been kicked off,=
 moderators should be voted into office, and this dumbass poll rule should =
not have come into effect. And that is the bottom line. How do you like me =
now?...
  ----- Original Message -----
  From: warriorazure
  To: nbwrpg@ya=
hoogroups.com
  Sent: Monday, May 06, 2002 6:56 PM
  Subject: Re: New poll =
for nbwrpg


  Stop that both of you or keep your petty squabbling private.=


  --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
  > I admit =
that alot of people are alot better than me,
  > but you could admit I'm im=
proving.
  > 
  > --- Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
  > > And nor shall you =
recieve an apology from me. What I
  > > said then I still feel 
  > > now =
as you seem to have not changed at all. I have
  > > kept my comments to my=
self 
  > > for what the past 6? 7 months? yet you pursue to
  > > slander =
me for past events.
